snippet: A new study suggests that under natural conditions, the climate in the earth's two hemispheres were out of step in past eras. Today, mountain ice is retreating worldwide, suggesting that human-produced greenhouse gases could be at work.
abstract: A new study suggests that under natural conditions, the climate in the earth's two hemispheres were out of step in past eras. Today, mountain ice is retreating worldwide, suggesting that human-produced greenhouse gases could be at work.

headline.main: Climate Insight From a Magical Mountain Range
